imgDesc.text: The places of worship are divided into Suncores and Mooncruxes. They each contain the power of Whitenight and Evernight, and are capable of bestowing such powers upon those who come to pay obeisances. Use these energies to activate mechanisms while in the opposite "day-night" state.

The places of worship are divided into Suncores and Mooncruxes. They each contain the power of Whitenight and Evernight, and are capable of bestowing such power upon those who come to pay obeisances. Use these energies to activate mechanisms while in the opposite "day-night" state.
